|default_ssid=Sprint MiFi2200 XXX |default_ssid_regex=^Sprint MiFi2200 [A-F0-9]{3}$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user= |default_pass=admin |oui=00:21:E8 |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} [http://www.sprint.com/cdma/assets/pdfs/phone_guides/novatel/novatel_mifi_2200_ug.pdf Quick Start Guide]
Much part information is sourced from [http://www2.electronicproducts.com/Novatel_Verizon_MiFi_2200-whatsinside_text-86.aspx this website]. The wireless module is sourced from Murata.
The default SSID is 'Sprint MiFi2200 XXX' where 'XXX' is the last three hex digits of the unit MAC address.
